players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "I find it strange that Bob was found dead so suddenly. Let's make sure we stay focused and not let our emotions cloud our judgment during this critical time."
You: "I agree with Charlie. Let's not jump to conclusions based on emotions. We need to gather more information and discuss our suspicions openly."

Charlie: "Let's consider the possibility that one of us has a special ability, such as being able to see who was killed at night. If this is the case, it could be beneficial for us to try and figure out who holds this power."
You: "I suggest we all share our observations and any suspicious behavior that we may have noticed during the night. This will help us narrow down the potential suspects."
Diana: "My suspicion is that Charlie is the mafioso."
